body_html: Do you run the same process on two machines, both specifying the same path, and different rank? This is not clear to me from your post. If you don't, then this is why it shows a timeout. One process is timing out waiting for another process to be started.

body: Do you run the same process on two machines, both specifying the same path, and different rank? This is not clear to me from your post. If you don't, then this is why it shows a timeout. One process is timing out waiting for another process to be started.
